description: Optimize React Query caching strategy and reduce unnecessary API calls
steps: Review all useQuery hooks for staleTime configuration (currently using default 0ms in AnalyticsDashboard)
Increase staleTime for stable data: analytics (5min→30min), library lists (5min→60min), recommendations (3min→15min)
Add gcTime (formerly cacheTime) to keep inactive queries cached for 10 minutes instead of default 5 minutes
Implement query deduplication using queryKey params to prevent duplicate requests during rapid navigation
Use QueryClient.setQueryDefaults to standardize caching across the app based on data freshness requirements
